description:
In Admin -> System ->Manage datatables Create datatable for a client with column type number.
Create client and click on the datatable created for the client -> Click on add button -> Enter the 16 digit number in the number field.
> Displayed error meesage as "Error" and not able to submit.

name: Mifos X Web App - While Creating The Datatable Allowed Length For Number Field Is Not Sufficient
